description: Assigns a set of tags to an item in a collection
name: tags_assign

collection.description: 'Collection' of the object to tag (ex: vms, hosts, datastores, etc)

id.description: ID of the item in 'Collection' to tag (ex: 100000123)

password.description: Password for username on the ManageIQ Server

server.description: Hostname or IP address of the ManageIQ Server

tags.description:
'Array of tag objects to be assigned to the item. Each tag object
 should have the following schema:
 - key: string
   value: string'

username.description: Username to login as on the ManageIQ Server
